item.text: - Extensively, widely-trained in Information Technology (I.T.) since ~1991.
- We offer the friendliest, most personable, expert Computer/Troubleshooting services in town, at excellently-valued prices.
- EXAMPLES OF WAYS WE CAN HELP YOU!
..helping you or your family or your small business to pick out a new computer
..or repair your operating system (in-person, or remotely),
..or fix your most difficult I.T. issue,
..or even analyze your CyberSecurity risks, attack surface, and vulnerabilities!
